model.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.observer.Observable<GameView>
      • model.game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameNetwork

    public class Game
extends Observable<GameView>
    The global Game class, it handles a whole game of PawnTest l'Initi√© from the start to the end.
